anathuruwa maha wihara wanshika shyamopali maha nikaye malwathu parshwaye prathama mahanayaka lesa thibbatuwawe shri buddharakkhitha mahimiyan da, anunayaka lesa rambaukwalle dharmarathana himiyan da path kala bawa lekhanagathawa pawathi.maha wihara parapure aithihasika hela paudathwaya udesa lankiya gihi pawidi ubhaya lokarthaya pinisath apamana sewawan sidukala maha nahimiwaru athara thibbatuwawe shri buddha rakkhitha maha nahimi, madawala shri aananda maha nahimi, daramitipola dhammarakkhitha maha nahimi, morathota dhammakkhandha maha nahimi, kobbakaduwe shri niwasa maha nahimi, waliwita shri saranankara maha nahimi, gammulle shri sumana maha nahimi, kotikahela shri sobhitha maha nahimi kandegedara shri rewatha maha nahimi, galgiriyawe shri dhammarakkhitha maha nahimi, parakumbaure shri wipassa madagama shri dewamiththa maha nahimi, hippola shri sobhitha maha nahimi, thibbatuwawe shri sumangala maha nahimi, galgiriyawe buddharakkhitha maha nahimi, amunugama piyadassi maha nahimi, ambaanwalle shri sumangala maha nahimi pahamune shri sumangala maha nahimi, rambaukwalle sobhitha maha nahimi, waliwita shri saranankara maha nahimi, purijjala, shri saranankara maha nahimi, amunugama shri wipassi maha nahimi, madugalle shri dhammasiddhi maha nahimi, sirimalwaththe shri aananda maha nahimi, rambaukwalle wipassi maha nahimi yana mahanayaka maha swamindrayan wahansela malwathu parshwagatha mahanahimiwaru lesa suwisheshi sewawak sidukara atha.2004 wasare abhinawa mahanayaka dhurayata ridi maha wiharadhipathi thibbatuwawe shri siddhartha sumangala swamindrayan wahanse path wuha.anunayaka rajakiya panditha, gaurawa shasthrawedi ambaanwalle shri siddhartha panynyasekara, gaurawa shasthrawedi niyangoda wijithasiri yana nayaka swamindrayan wahansela katayuthu karathi.pradhana lekhakadhikari gaurawa shasthrawedi walgowwagoda shri medhankara wimalabuddhi swamindrayan wahanse, niyojya lekhakadhikari shasthrapathi diwulkumbaure shri saranankara wimalabuddhi swamindrayan wahanse katayuthu karathi.shyamopali wanshika mahanikaye parshwagatha kotte shri kalyani samagi්ra dharma maha sangha sabhawa, uuwa shyamapaliwanshika nikaya kalyani samagi්ra dharma maha sangha sabhawa, rangiri dambaulu parshwaya, shri rohana parshwaya, wanawasa parshwaya katayuthu karamin ubhaya lokarthaya, sambuddha shasana chira pawathma udesa apamana sewawak sidu karamin lokawasinge gaurawa bahumanayata pathrawa atha.
